hero.title: The Italian food revolution
hero.description: Bring the new Italian style to your venue

comparison.ellipseSubtitle: The Only Pizza Base with Triple Fermentation.

pan.title: Pan di20
pan.item1: Leavening and fermentation: 28 hours with 3 rising phases, for a highly digestible dough.
pan.item2: Texture: Crunchy on the outside, soft inside, with a light structure.
pan.item3: Versatility: Perfect as a base for gourmet dishes, from appetizers to main courses.
pan.item4: Easy to use: Ready in 5 minutes, with no waste.
pan.item5: Selected ingredients: High-quality Italian flours, olive oil, and only 0.3% brewer’s yeast.

pinsa.title: Pinsa
pinsa.item1: Leavening and fermentation: Around 48 hours, with high hydration.
pinsa.item2: Texture: Extremely crispy outside and very soft inside.
pinsa.item3: Usage: Best suited for light, fresh, and delicate toppings.
pinsa.item4: Tradition: An ancient dough made with a mix of flours for a rustic flavor.

pizza.title: Pizza
pizza.item1: Leavening and fermentation: Variable, generally between 6 and 24 hours.
pizza.item2: Texture: Can range from soft and airy (Neapolitan style) to crispy (Roman style).
pizza.item3: Usage: Designed to be topped and served as a main Course.
pizza.item4: Popularity: The most well-known and widely consumed baked product worldwide.

paragraph.part1: Pan di20 was created at Borgo 20, one of the most renowned restaurants in Parma,
paragraph.italic: the heart of Italy’s Food Valley
paragraph.part2: Developed in a kitchen that celebrates quality, innovation, and tradition, Pan di20 still nowadays, offers the excellence of Italian craftsmanship to the professional foodservice industry.

versatility.title: Versatility
versatility.description: Compatible with infinite topping combinations, from classic to gourmet.

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: Simplifies plating and usage, suitable for professionals and non-experts alike.

value.title: High Value
value.description: A unique product with high perceived value for the end customer.

innovation.label: INNOVATION
innovation.subtitle: The Best offer to a Chef and pizza Maker

versatility.title: Versatility:
versatility.text: Compatible with infinite topping combinations, from classic to gourmet. Ideal for innovative pizzerias.

convenience.title: Convenience:
convenience.text: Simplifies plating and usage, suitable for professionals and non-experts alike.

ticket.title: Increase the average ticket value:
ticket.text: Thanks to a unique product with high perceived value for the end customer.

panbox.box1: It is made up of two different flours mixed together: type 1 soft wheat and durum wheat flour and type 2 soft wheat, durum wheat and spelled flour. This means slightly refined flours with a high percentage of fibre, without added animal fats.

box2.title: CRISPY CLOUD:
box2.text: Due to the long fermentation of over 28 hours and its three distinct fermentation phases, we achieve a crispy crust and a soft interior, like-cloud.

panbox.box3: Perfect for the creativity of modern chefs and contemporary pizza makers, allowing them to create innovative dishes or pizzas with high perceived value. It lets a restaurant pair its bread with a signature recipe for a premium experience and helps a pizzeria craft a product that boosts the average ticket.

feature2.title: Selected Italian flours Type1 e Type2:
feature2.text: Soft Wheat, Durum Wheat, and Spelt – Rich in Fibers.

feature4.title: Only Italian Natural Ingredients:
feature4.text: Flour, Water, Olive Oil, Salt, and Brewer's Yeast.

prepare.title: Easy to prepare:
prepare.text:
Ready in 3-5 Minutes at 220°/280°C
With every type of oven

professional.title1: THE BENEFITS OF PAN DI20 PROFESSIONAL
left: Slow rising and easy to digest
Suitable for sweet and savoury recipes
right: Perfect with any type of oven
Can be prepared in a thousands of ways

revolution.label: INTRODUCTION TO PAN DI20
revolution.subtitle: In the concept of the pizza base
revolution.description:
Pan di20 redefines the concept of a pizza base in modern gastronomy.
It is not just a supporting element for dishes, but a key component that enhances every ingredient.
revolution.footer: Pan di20 elevates your culinary experience to the next level.

cards.title: Premium thick crust Base :
cards.text: Perfect for pairing with any combination of Toppings, amplifying their flavors.

cards.title: Versatile and practical :
cards.text: Ideal for restaurants, bistros, Pizzerias and catering, thanks to its quick and easy use.

cards.title: Unlimited creativity :
cards.text: The perfect foundation for innovative and refined proposals. Pan di20 is the perfect blend of innovation and tradition.

tradition.label: PREMIUM QUALITY FROM ITALY
tradition.title: TRADITION MEET MODERNITY
tradition.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence:

list.title: 01. MADE IN ITALY :
list.description: Strictly compliant with FSSC 22000 certifications, ensuring the highest standards of food safety and quality.

list.title: 02. Craftsmanship and Technology:
list.description: A perfect balance between Italian tradition and cutting-edge innovation, delivering superior performance and consistency.

list.title: 03. Preferred by Best Venue in Italy:
list.description: For unmatched quality and cost-efficiency. Selected by top restaurants and pizzerias.

tradition.footer: Elevate your menu with the authenticity and reliability of Pan di20

slides.description: Pan di20 baked with tomato sauce and mozzarella; after baking, add: Burrata, Bebè Rosso (Ginos), Basil Cream (or Genovese Pesto), and EVO Oil.
Pan di20 baked with tomato sauce and cooked vegetables of choice. After baking add: fresh vegetables seasoned with rosemary oil, oregano, and a drizzle of soy sauce.
Pan di20 baked with Mozzarella; after baking, add: Pulled Pork, BBQ Sauce, Sweet and Sour Onion, Mustard Sauce, and EVO Oil.
Pan di20 baked without toppings; after baking, add: Burrata, Caramelized Red Onion (Ginos), Tuna Tataki, Ginger Gel, and EVO Oil.
Mozzarella during baking; after baking add: Beef Tartare, Capers, Pepper, Spring Onion (Ginos), Mustard Cream, EVO Oil. Optional: Parmesan flakes or Raspberry/Mango gel.
Pan di20 baked with Artichoke Cream and Mozzarella; after baking add: Duck Breast Roast Beef, Jus with Orange, Fresh Artichokes, and Saffron Parmesan Cream.
